awards.text: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 3 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: A penniless middle-aged spinster scrapes by giving piano lessons in the Dublin of the 1950s. She makes a sad last bid for love with a fellow resident of her rundown boarding house, who imagines she has the money to bankroll the business he hopes to open.
plot: She falls in love with a broken down former NYC hotel doorman, who tells Judith vaguely that he was in the hotel business.
title: The Lonely Passion of Judith Hearne
